page.title: 01Transport
page.content: The area is well served by public transport organisations. Greater Manchester Passenger Transport Executive operate bus services through Bredbury, Woodley and Romiley. Through Bredbury and Woodley the 329, 330 and 331 travel from Stockport to Ashton via Hyde. Also from Ashton to Marple via Hyde, Woodley and Romiley the 388 and 389 run. The 382 and 383 run from Stockport to Romiley via Bents Lane, Bredbury and the 333 runs from Manchester to Romiley (Watermeetings Lane). Bredbury, Romiley and Woodley each has its own railway station with normal facilities Bredbury station was rebuilt within the last fifteen years. Btedbury and Romiley are on the same line taking trains from New Mills to Manchester Piccadilly via Marple. .
